facial_features.eyes: focused almond eyes with athletic intensity, dark brown irises with determination, naturally strong brows
facial_features.nose: straight athletic nose with defined bridge and clean lines
facial_features.lips: balanced medium lips with natural definition and healthy tone
facial_features.cheekbones: lean defined cheekbones with athletic muscle tone and natural contour
facial_features.jawline: strong defined jawline with athletic structure and determined chin
facial_features.overall: fitness-focused beauty with athletic definition, strong refined features, naturally toned and energetic
